name: Amit Khurana Sir
bio: Amit Khurana Sir is a renowned Computer Science educator and GATE expert with over 15 years of experience in teaching computer science subjects. He specializes in GATE preparation and has helped thousands of students achieve their dream of cracking GATE with top ranks. His teaching methodology focuses on conceptual clarity and practical problem-solving approaches.
achievements: Helped 1000+ students crack GATE with top 100 ranks
Expert in Computer Networks and Digital Logic

name: Harkirat Singh
bio: Harkirat Singh is a full-stack developer and educator who has built multiple successful startups. He specializes in modern web development technologies and has taught thousands of students through his comprehensive courses. His teaching approach combines industry best practices with hands-on project-based learning.
teachingStyle: Project-based learning with industry best practices

name: Keerti Purswani
bio: Keerti Purswani is a software engineer and system design expert with extensive experience in building scalable applications. She specializes in high-level and low-level system design, helping students understand complex architectural patterns and design principles used in top tech companies.
achievements: System design expert at top tech companies
Specialized in HLD and LLD concepts

name: Coding Seekhho
bio: Coding Seekhho is a comprehensive programming education platform led by experienced instructors. They specialize in teaching programming fundamentals, data structures, algorithms, and web development. Their courses are designed to take students from beginner to advanced level with practical, hands-on learning.
achievements: Expert in C and Python programming

name: Apna College
bio: Apna College is a leading educational platform founded by Aman Dhattarwal, focusing on making quality programming education accessible to everyone. They offer comprehensive courses in Java, C++, MERN stack development, and aptitude preparation, helping students build successful careers in technology.

name: Take U Forward
bio: Take U Forward, led by Striver, is a platform dedicated to helping students excel in competitive programming and technical interviews. They specialize in data structures and algorithms preparation, providing comprehensive coverage of topics essential for cracking coding interviews at top tech companies.
